title: What we know about the Trump agenda
shortDescription: It has delighted supporters and alarmed opposition, but can the Trump agenda overcome Congress and legal challenges? Here is what we know now.

title: A recession in 2025? Trump declines to make prediction
shortDescription: Asked in an interview with Maria Bartiromo whether the U.S. could soon face a recession, Donald Trump said, "I hate to predict things like that."

title: Secret Service shoots armed man after 'confrontation' near White House
shortDescription: The suspect was taken to an area hospital and his condition is not immediately available, officials said. No other injuries were reported.

title: Trump's Park Service cuts, tariff threats worry tourist town
shortDescription: In a tourist town still struggling to climb out from pandemic restrictions, Canadian tourists are canceling trips

title: Trump's triumphs: How he achieves the wildest dreams of conservatives
shortDescription: Dismantle the Education Department? On it. Slash the federal bureaucracy? Done. The 47th president is checking off conservatives' impossible dreams.

title: 'Tools of the minority:' What congressional Democrats could do
shortDescription: Progressive activists have a strategy for fighting Trump: protesting congressional Democrats. Will it work?

title: 'Stand Up for Science' rallies protest Trump research cuts: Photos
shortDescription: Rallies brought together leading researchers, former administrators and people who benefitted from medical advances.

title: Trump, Musk weigh in on daylight saving time. What to know.
shortDescription: Trump shared his thoughts about daylight saving time this week. Musk conducted a poll on X. The political debate has been going on for years.

title: US House Republicans unveil six-month stopgap bill to avert shutdown
shortDescription: The proposal would fund the government through September, and mostly maintain levels of spending passed during the last administration.

title: JD Vance comments to Mike Johnson on Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance didn't seem enthusiastic about the length of President Trump's joint address to Congress on Tuesday in a hot mic moment.

title: Trump wants to cut down more trees. It’s stirring a debate over wildfires.
shortDescription: The Trump administration's plan to boost timber production on federal lands faces pushback about wildfires, environmental concerns and economics.

title: Safety fears, feeling ‘invisible.’ Transgender Americans react to Trump
shortDescription: Trump's aggressive stance against transgender and nonbinary people threatens to make them invisible. Some fear it could also make them targets.

title: What happens to my school if Trump shuts the Education Department?
shortDescription: Linda McMahon said Trump "certainly intends" to dismantle the Education Department. What would that mean for schools and students?

title: NIH cuts loom for docs who helped treat cancer survivor Trump honored
shortDescription: President Donald Trump honored a child cancer survivor during his joint address to Congress amid proposing vast cuts to medical research.

title: Trump tries to change student loan relief for some borrowers
shortDescription: President Trump on Friday signed an order attempting to limit the types of student loan borrowers eligible for certain types of debt relief.

title: Trump boosts crypto in White House meeting with industry leaders
shortDescription: President Donald Trump gathered leaders from the cryptocurrency industry in the White House Friday for a summit.

title: Trump: 'I haven't even heard' about a pardon for Derek Chauvin
shortDescription: Trump said he has not considered a pardon for Derek Chauvin, nor had he heard about Ben Shapiro's push for the former Minneapolis cop to be pardoned.

title: Trump administration prepping travel ban
shortDescription: The Trump Administration is planning to implement a travel ban that will block some for entering the country.

title: Tariff news recap: Another week of back and forth as Trump scales back
shortDescription: Donald Trump put into place tariffs against Canada and Mexico earlier this week. But after the stock market slipped, he has carved out big exemptions.

title: President Trump threaten sanctions on Russia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he needs to make sure Ukraine wants a deal before restarting military assistance and aid in the war against Russia.

title: Trump administration cancels $400 million in funding to Columbia U.
shortDescription: The president's task force on antisemitism announced the move Friday, citing what they called the school's failure to protect Jewish students.
